folder: Park Avenue & Vreeland Avenue, Staten Island, NY
text:
Park Avenue, at the N.W. corner of Vreeland Avenue, showing the Park Baptist Church. The view is from Vreeland Avenue near Port Richmond Park (right).

About 1905

By Mulford Simonson
From Staten Island Museum Collection through P. L. Sperr

(2)

Another view of the church and its environs.

About 1905

By Mulford Simonson
From Staten Island Museum Collection through P. L. Sperr
